fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Survey an any player during the night. Does not have to be authorized.
- Survey the Sentry (Power) during the night. 1 Use.
- Put on a bulletproof vest during the night. 1 Use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Surveying a player will grant them Powerful defense.
- You will attack one visitor of the player you survey. Prioritizes attacks, then negative effects. Randomize in a tie.
